layer2-connection.help: Indicate whether layer 2 connections are present among FGSP members.
layer2-connection.name: layer2-connection

options.help: There exist layer 2 connections among FGSP members.
options.name: available

options.help: There does not exist layer 2 connection among FGSP members.
options.name: unavailable

psksecret.help: Pre-shared secret for session synchronization (ASCII string or hexadecimal encoded with a leading 0x).
psksecret.name: psksecret

session-sync-dev.help: Offload session-sync process to kernel and sync sessions using connected interface(s) directly.
session-sync-dev.name: session-sync-dev

standalone-group-id.help: Cluster group ID (0 - 255). Must be the same for all members.
standalone-group-id.name: standalone-group-id

results.help: Configure FortiGate Session Life Support Protocol (FGSP) cluster attributes.
results.name: standalone-cluster
